2. Description of Service

Listify is a web application that allows users to create and manage to-do lists. The service is provided "as is" and we are not responsible for any data loss or other issues that may arise from the use of the app.

3. User Conduct

Users agree to use the app only for lawful purposes and in a way that does not infringe the rights of, restrict or inhibit anyone else's use and enjoyment of the app. Prohibited behavior includes harassing or causing distress or inconvenience to any other user, transmitting obscene or offensive content, or disrupting the normal flow of dialogue within the app.

4. Privacy Policy

Your use of the app is also subject to our Privacy Policy. Please review our Privacy Policy, which also governs the app and informs users of our data collection practices.
